# NSExtensionServiceFinderPreviewLabel

**Property List Key**

A name for display when the extension appears in the Finder Preview pane and Quick Actions menu.

## Discussion

This key is used in conjunction with the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/NSExtension/NSExtensionAttributes/NSExtensionServiceAllowsFinderPreviewItem] key.

If the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/NSExtension/NSExtensionAttributes/NSExtensionServiceFinderPreviewLabel] key isn’t provided, the extension’s display name is used.

## Quick Actions

- **NSExtensionServiceAllowsFinderPreviewItem**: A Boolean value indicating whether the extension appears in the Finder Preview pane and Quick Actions menu.
- **NSExtensionServiceFinderPreviewIconName**: The name of an icon for display when the extension appears in the Finder Preview pane and Quick Actions menu.
- **NSExtensionServiceRoleType**: The type of task an Action extension performs.
